About

Thanks for stopping by. Read below to learn more about myself and my background.

Professional Summary

Master's degree in Software Engineering | Specialist in Artificial Intelligence and DevOps | Full Stack Developer | Frontend Specialist

Software Engineer and Full Stack developer specialized in Frontend developments through technologies and frameworks such as React, Angular, Astro, Java, JavaScript, Yii2, SQL, and Python. I create professional web applications with connections to relational and non-relational databases, interactive features, and modern JavaScript/TypeScript functionalities.

Motivated professional committed to continuous learning and development. Daily practitioner of self-improvement through platforms like Platzi, with expertise in software design, graphic design, UI/UX, digital marketing, and social media management. Bilingual professional (English & Spanish) with experience in remote and on-site environments.

Specialties: Frontend Development, Full Stack Web Applications, Graphic Design, UI/UX, Digital Marketing, DevOps, Artificial Intelligence, Data Engineering
